summary.span: 表示 子元素的有序集合。

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类使用 来表示其子元素的集合。The base class uses a to represent its collection of child elements. 定义的方法和属性会影响从 派生的所有对象，并定义 子元素操作的公共功能集。Methods and properties defined by the affect all objects derived from and define a common feature-set for the manipulation of child elements. 与自身的上下文（类）关联。A has affinity to its own context (class). 您必须从拥有的 的上下文中访问该集合。You must access the collection from the context of the owning . ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法将子内容添加到父 。The following example uses the method to add child content to a parent . 可以通过使用 类型的 属性来执行此操作。You do this by using the property, which is of type .
